detaileddescription.para: This is connected to the logger. Can be used to redirect logs to any other log
Redirect debug log to unit_test.log files

Retrieve the command line arguments from boost. Allows usage like: test_bitcoin --run_test="net_tests/cnode_listen_port" -- -checkaddrman=1 -printtoconsole=1 which would return ["-checkaddrman=1", "-printtoconsole=1"].
Retrieve the boost unit test name.
Register common test args. Shared across binaries that rely on the test framework.
Make a test setup that has disk access to the debug.log file disabled. Can be used in "hot loops", for example fuzzing or benchmarking.
